members.member:
Maximum distance damage propagates to.
Propagated damage at distance x is computed as follows: dmg' = dmg * (1 - x / DamagePropagationDistance) ^ DamagePropagationExponent

Exponent that curves the damage modification over distance.
Propagated damage at distance x is computed as follows: dmg' = dmg * (1 - x / DamagePropagationDistance) ^ DamagePropagationExponent

member.summary: Linear impulse applied to fracture pieces on generation will be multiplied by this value.

member.summary: Angular impulse applied to fracture pieces on generation will be multiplied by this value.

member.summary: Soft limit of fracture pieces that can be generated per frame. After that * 2 every 2nd, * 3 every 3rd, and above every 7th

member.summary: Delay when regenerating chunks of terrain.

member.name: F:Medieval.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.Components.Planet.MyObjectBuilder_TerrainDamageComponentDefinition.ChunkSize
member.summary: Size of a terrain chunk as understood by the terrain damage component.

remarks.para: Larger chunks mean fewer operations scheduled, but slower overall operation as more grids need to be collected for a given refresh.
Chunk size does not affect new damage, only regeneration.
The chunk size must be a power of two, if the provided values is not it will be rounded to the next highest power of two.

member.summary: Background color of the stat bar.

member.summary: Foreground color of the stat bar.

member.summary: Value at which the notches start balancing their interval instead. This prevents the bar from growing beyond a certain size. Ignored for any value equal to or less than 0.

member.summary: Interval of stat value between each notch. Ignored for any value equal to or less than 0.

member.summary: Sensitivity of arrows to changes of main stat value. Ignored for any value equal to or less than 0.

member.summary: Main stat for the bar.

member.summary: Notch information for the bar.

member.summary: Arrow settings.
